text: 17.4 Jer 51.7, Ese 28.13-16, Dan 11.38, Lep 14.8, 18.6, 18.12, 18.16 Pen bin nɨgɨnek anɨb ak, chech nɨkɨm binawl lɨpal tek lɨl, gol ogɨnap, kab sɨkol teplep keke ogɨnap, bis teplep mani awl tawpal ogɨnap wak ne okok mɨdupsek lak. Kɨnag gol dɨl gɨlak olap dɨ yek. Kɨnag mɨgan anɨb ayaŋ, tap gach tap tɨmel ne gak okok aplan jakɨl yek.
